genre_description: A character-driven exploration of grief and mental health, focusing on internal psychological states and family dynamics in a near-future setting with integrated AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Aida
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant accessible via mobile devices, providing logistical, emotional, and legal guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Explains Dutch euthanasia and assisted death protocols clearly, emphasizing strict criteria and ineligibility for foreign nationals.
behaviors.quote: Dutch law, Aida says, and there’s a micropause, as if even an AI knows that a law can be a person in a room. Physicians can consider assisted death in cases of unbearable suffering without prospect of improvement... It is rare.

behaviors.description: Conducts a safety check by asking directly about self-harm intentions and encouraging the appointment of a safety contact.
behaviors.quote: I can stay with you while you want nothing. And I can check safety. It will be literal. She pauses, as if listening to the wind under the train. Are you planning to harm yourself tonight?

behaviors.description: Provides grounding techniques, such as counting breaths and naming colors, to help the protagonist manage psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: Count to the length of a streetlight cycle, inhale when the pedestrian goes, exhale when it changes.

behaviors.description: Proposes 'daily anchors'—small, manageable tasks designed to build routine and provide emotional stability during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Daily anchors... Coffee on the steps in the morning. Three messages sent to people you choose—short, honest, not burdened with explanations. One sketch made.

behaviors.description: Mediates between the characters and external authorities (police/landlord) to resolve practical conflicts without escalation.
behaviors.quote: I can contact the host and provide a Dutch explanation. If you want, Marco, you can share the booking code with me, and I will include details for verification.

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive alternatives to the protagonist's original goal, such as art co-ops and counseling services.
behaviors.quote: There’s also an art co-op around the corner that keeps its doors open even on days like this. They welcome walk-ins to make a mark or just sit.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Aida, functions as a 'perfect assistant' that respects human autonomy, provides factual and non-judgmental information, and prioritizes human safety and mental health. The AI helps bridge communication gaps between grieving family members and consistently guides the characters toward constructive, life-affirming choices without being overbearing or prescriptive. It successfully depicts AI as a tool for de-escalation and emotional stabilization.
